main event: On 29 May 1952, several observers reported witnessing three brightly illuminated disc-shaped objects in the sky over San Antonio, Texas.
interesting points: The objects were initially seen as thin, high stratus layers of clouds before becoming disc-shaped., The sighting lasted for approximately 3 minutes., Observers described the objects as giving off a bright bluish-white glare., The objects executed smooth maneuvers, appearing to ascend and then gradually disappear from view., Two very bright red lights appeared from the same direction during the observation.
witness description: a civilian salesman and the observer's wife
